Body: When I swipe out or exit viber app on my android device and a person sends me a message from his iPhone I am able to recieve the message and the sender sees on his iPhone viber app that the message was 'delivered' to me.On the contrary, if he closes/swipes out his viber app on his iPhone and I send him a message, he can view my message on his notification or lock screen without even opening the viber app. But my viber app on my android device does NOT say that the message was 'delivered', it just stays "blank" as if his phone/internet is off. My phone says it was 'delivered' only after he opens his viber app again. My question is how can I do that from an android device? I want to be able to view incoming viber messages on my android notification panel or lock screen while the sender does not see 'delivered' on his iPhone device. It seems this is only possible from iPhone viber app but not possible from android viber app because even if i exit viber app on my android, the sender's iPhone still shows that it was 'delivered' when he send me a message.Please help if there is a way to do this from android viber.Many thanks in advance!
Title: Android Viber app exit vs. iPhone Viber app exit
